question: Who is the chairperson of the National Green Tribunal?
option1: Retired Judge of the Supreme Court
option2: Retired Judge of the High Court
option3: Retired Judge of the District Court
option4: Retired Judge of the Subordinate Court
answer: Retired Judge of the Supreme Court
explanation: A retired Judge of the Supreme Court of India can be the chairperson of National Green Tribunal. It is headquartered in New Delhi. Each bench of the NGT comprises of at least one Judicial Member and one Expert Member.
